price: 19. Iyo qaniimooyin badan oo ay qaadan, Alle waa Adkaade, Xakiim ah.
arabic: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةٗ يَأۡخُذُونَهَاۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamaghānima kathīratan yakhudhūnahā wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
